snippet: Charter Communications has played its latest move in its pursuit of Time Warner Cable, nominating a full slate of directors to its target’s board. | Federal prosecutors have filed actions against businesses that buy luxury cars at domestic...
abstract: Charter Communications has played its latest move in its pursuit of Time Warner Cable, nominating a full slate of directors to its target’s board. | Federal prosecutors have filed actions against businesses that buy luxury cars at domestic dealerships and then send them to China. | The S.E.C. may have helped create the problem it is now hoping to solve. | Janet L. Yellen set a familiar direction for the Fed in her first public remarks before Congress on Tuesday.

headline.main: A Twist in Charter's Pursuit of a Cable Deal
